A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Like many others\, I was beyond thrilled to watch this movie. But like MANY others\, was truly saddened and disappointing. I was truly invested in these new characters\, and all of their stories fell so flat. What is there to hope for in IX? A lifelong SW fan who has loved every other SW movie in its own way\, now crushed by TLJ. Didn't even watch the Solo movie. Please\, please fix SW\, Disney.
